PSCT.Base: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your Main Monster Zone, adjacent to a "Scareclaw" monster you control or in its column. You can only Special Summon "Scareclaw Astra" once per turn this way. Your "Scareclaw" monsters in the Extra Monster Zone(s) can attack a number of times each Battle Phase, up to the number of Defense Position "Scareclaw" monsters you control with different names.
